Title: Object: De Vlugt naar Egypte
Object: La fuite en Egypte
Description: The Flight into Egypt; classical scene with the Holy Family stepping over rocks in foreground, the Virgin carrying the Child while Joseph holds the donkey; after Adriaen van der Werff; illustration to Johannes Immerzeel's 'Het Koninklijk Museum van 's Gravenhage, op steen gebragt' (Amsterdam: 1828-1833). c.1828 Lithograph on chine collé
Producer name: Print made by: Carel Christiaan Antony Last
Curator's comments: For comment see 1857,0613.637 After the 1710 painting by Adriaen van der Werff in the Mauritshuis, The Hague, inv.no.209; see Barbara Gaehtgens, 'Adriaen van der Werff 1659-1722', Munich, 1987, cat.no.74. It was painted on the occasion of the eightteenth brithday of the artist's daughter Maria.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: A E Evans & Sons
